thread.title: Local UAW members learn details of latest Fiat Chrysler deal
thread.title_full: Local UAW members learn details of latest Fiat Chrysler deal

author: 13abc
title: Local UAW members learn details of latest Fiat Chrysler deal
text:
13abc (WTVG) - Local UAW workers are learning the details of their latest agreement with Fiat Chrysler. It is currently a wait and see if those workers will like it enough to approve it.
Union members were trickling in and out of the UAW Local 12 Union Hall for a morning meeting Wednesday. The UAW has released some details already about but Wednesday members hoped to get clarity and even make up their minds.
This is the second deal the UAW has received from fiat Chrysler. The first one was voted down by about 60 percent of the members nationwide. That led to the potential of a strike, which was avoided by this last minute.
This current deal moves to close the wage gap between newer and more experienced workers. It also has a signing bonus, promises to invest billions in its plant and a moratorium on outsourcing. But for each member, the concerns and the issues vary.
Actual voting begins October 20th.
